2.title: Do you often feel tired, fatigued or sleepy during the daytime?

3.title: Has anyone noticed you stop breathing during your sleep?

4.title: Do you have or are you being treated for high blood pressure?

STOP.ui:description: Reference: STOP Questionnaire (Chung F et al. Anesthesiology 2008 May; 108(5):812-21)
STOP.ui:help: Patients answering Yes to 2 or more of the above questions are at high risk of having OSA and may be referred directly for a Home Based Sleep Study. The Epworth Sleepiness Scale (ESS) may also be used to further determine the necessity for the investigation.
